name: Wistfall Coronet
description: The Wistfall Coronet depicts melancholy’s beauty.

languages.description: Die Zierde: Wistfall zeigt die Schönheit der Melancholie.
languages.name: Zierde: Wistfall

languages.description: Cette couronne dépeint la beauté de la mélancolie.
languages.name: Couronne de Mélancolie

languages.description: La Corona Wistfall mostra la bellezza della malinconia.
languages.name: Corona Wistfall

languages.description: 위스트폴 두관은 우울한 감정의 아름다움을 묘사합니다.
languages.name: 위스트폴 두관

languages.description: La Corona Wistfall representa la belleza de la melancolía.
languages.name: Corona Wistfall

languages.description: 忧泣马冠展示了忧郁之美。
languages.name: 忧泣马冠

languages.description: Wistfallコロネットは憂鬱さの美学を描く。
languages.name: Wistfall コロネット

languages.description: A Coroa da Melancolia retrata a beleza da tristeza.
languages.name: Coroa da Melancolia

languages.description: 愁淚馬冠代表著鬱鬱寡歡之美。
languages.name: 愁淚馬冠

languages.description: มงกุฎ Wistfall สื่อให้เห็นถึงความเศร้าสลดที่งดงาม
languages.name: มงกุฎ Wistfall

languages.description: Wistfall Tacı, melankolinin güzelliğini tasvir eder.
languages.name: Wistfall Taç
